parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioning compressor can cause the compressor to seize, leading to a sudden loss of power steering and potentially causing a crash. Additionally, the failure can result in a snapped serpentine belt, which can cause damage to other engine components and lead to a loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The air conditioning unit binds and freezes up
the serpentine belt may snap off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioning compressor can cause the vehicle to stall or die while driving, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The air conditioning compressor makes a noise when turned on
the vehicle stalls or dies when the air conditioning is turned on
the vehicle will not start with the air conditioning turned on
but will start when the air conditioning is turned off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain tensioner can cause the engine to stall or stop running, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The engine stops running while driving
the vehicle is unsafe to drive

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The denial of warranty claims by the manufacturer can leave vehicle owners with costly repairs and potential financial burdens.
symptoms: The manufacturer refuses to honor the warranty
the dealer claims that previous repairs void the warranty
the vehicle owner is faced with expensive repairs and potential financial losses.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sticking of the accelerator pedal can cause unexpected acceleration, loss of vehicle control, and accidents, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The accelerator pedal feels stuck or hesitant
the vehicle zigzags or loses control
the vehicle surges forward without input from the driver.
